org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager

Class UserConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.configuration.ConfigurationObject
      • org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager.UserConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorizationConfig

    public class UserConfig
extends ConfigurationObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    Configuration Java Object which represents a Local AAA user configuration information for User Manager.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getUncheckedUserConfig

        public static UserConfig getUncheckedUserConfig(java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> roles)
        Returns UserConfig instance populated with the passed parameters. It does not run any checks on the passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        password - the plain text password
        roles - the list of roles
        Returns:
        the UserConfig object populated with the passed parameters. No validity check is run on the input parameters.
